Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at NH Zamora Palacio del Duero places you in the heart of Zamora, walking distance from Abastos Market and Puente de Piedra. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Museo de la Semana Santa and Santiago del Burgo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 49 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request rollaway/extra beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional features include babysitting/childcare and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Zamora? This hotel features 8726 square feet (811 square meters) of event facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at NH Zamora Palacio del Duero places you in the heart of Zamora, walking distance from Abastos Market and Puente de Piedra. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Museo de la Semana Santa and Santiago del Burgo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Abastos Market - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Puente de Piedra - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museo de la Semana Santa - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Santiago del Burgo - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Zamora Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Zamora Castle - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Bodegas Monte la Reina - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi
Bodegas Estancia Pierda - 28.4 km / 17.7 mi
Monasterio del Sancti Spiritus - 28.6 km / 17.8 mi
Dominio del Bendito - 29.1 km / 18.1 mi
Colegiata de Santa Maria la Mayor - 29.2 km / 18.1 mi
Marques de Olivara - 30.1 km / 18.7 mi
Bodegas Farina - 30.5 km / 19 mi
Church of Villardiegua de la Ribera - 36.7 km / 22.8 mi
The Mule - 36.7 km / 22.8 mi

The preferred airport for NH Zamora Palacio del Duero is Salamanca (SLM-Matacan) - 65.6 km / 40.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
